snippet: After her own son was born two and a half months ahead of schedule, she wrote a popular manual, “The Premature Baby Book,” to help other parents in similar situations.
abstract: Helen Harrison, who wrote The Premature Baby Book, popular manual for dealing with premature births, based on her own experience of having premature son, dies at age 68.
lead_paragraph: After her own son was born two and a half months ahead of schedule, she wrote a popular manual, “The Premature Baby Book,” to help other parents in similar situations.

headline.main: Helen Harrison, Authority on the Trials of Premature Births, Dies at 68
headline.print_headline: Helen Harrison, 68, Authority on Premature Births

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Premature Baby Book: A Parents' Guide to Coping and Caring in the First Years (Book)
